title: Design for a [Needle Threader or Punch ?] and a Pair of Scissors with Handles Formed by Half-figures of  Sea Monsters
medium: Pen and ink, brush and gray wash on heavy off-white paper
description: Vertical rectangle showing two objects with, possibly, a punch or needle threader at left and a pair of scissors whose handles are formed by half-figures of sea monsters.
name: Drawing
